title: CharSpace: Charge Apple watch using iPhone or iPad
text:
Smart watches becoming the way of the future and are exceptional pieces of technology. But, carrying around yet another charger can be a burden. CharSpace is a new and innovative way to charge your devices on the go and with minimal clutter.
Introducing CharSpace ; an elegant and stylish watch strap for all of your charging needs. With a USB connector built into the strap you have the ability to charge your smartwatch from your computer or a USB socket.
CharSpace utilizes a lightning connector which means you can charge your watch using your smart phone. Charging your devices in tandem saves you time and reduces bag clutter. More importantly, CharSpace also acts as a data cable for syncing files between devices and your computer. Instead of carrying a handful of cables around you have one convenient cable for charging and data storage. With built in memory up to 128GB you can stream music, photos and videos on the go. Keep the extra cables and chargers at home. Simplify your life with one device that can meet all of your data needs.
CharSpace is more than just a cable and data device. Itâ€™s also a stylish product. Made with high quality silicone for perfect fit and comfort. Your smartwatch is a part of you. Be comfortable wearing it. And finally? CharSpace comes with app compatible software for iOS, Android and windows supporting data transfers and video. No need for extra computers or software. Everything is simplified with CharSpace.
With your extended support we can make this device a reality.
For more information visit the Indiegogo campaign at https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/charspace-charge-apple-watch-using-iphone-or-ipad
